alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 10:10PM CDT until June 14 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Southern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... Northern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1010 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Samson, or 12 miles east of Florala, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Hartford, Level Plains, Samson, Clayhatchee, Kinston, Coffee Springs, Chancellor, Kellys Crossroads, Lytle, Lucile, Gerald, Marl, Central City, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Hendrix Crossroad, Cairns Aaf and Earlytown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southeastern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southeastern Alabama.
